Class SATPlanner

java.lang.Object
fr.uga.pddl4j.planners.AbstractPlanner
fr.uga.pddl4j.planners.statespace.AbstractStateSpacePlanner
fr.uga.pddl4j.tutorial.satplanner.SATPlanner
All Implemented Interfaces:
fr.uga.pddl4j.planners.Planner, fr.uga.pddl4j.planners.statespace.StateSpacePlanner, java.io.Serializable
public final class SATPlanner
extends fr.uga.pddl4j.planners.statespace.AbstractStateSpacePlanner
This class implements a simple SAT planner based on SAT4J.

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args) throws java.io.IOException
      The main method of the SATPlanner example. The command line syntax is as follow: usage of SATPlanner:

      OPTIONS DESCRIPTIONS

      -o str operator file name -f str fact file name -t num specifies the maximum CPU-time in seconds -n num specifies the maximum number of steps -q quiet console output -h print this message

      Parameters:
      args - the arguments of the command line.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
